title: A function I learned
description: A short description of the post.
contents:
abline function
Given a graph of penguin body mass as a function of penguin flipper length, the geom_smooth(method = lm) function creates a best fit line for the scatterplot.
Within the function geom_smooth(), you can specify if you want the line to show a confidence interval with se = FALSE or TRUE.
Furthermore, you can add linetype = “dashed” to change the line type.
